content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam Abbasi, the rental price is non-negotiable. It is €1,000 per month. I am sure you will find the location of the apartment in the city center Duisburg quite convenient, as it is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because there is no room for price flexibility discussed.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
